articles.author: Umang Sharma, Umang Sharma
articles.title: Made in India malaria vaccines head to Africa, SII ships first set - Firstpost
articles.description: Pune-based Serum Institute of India, SII, has dispatched as many as 43,200 doses of malaria vaccine to Africa from its facility on Monday
articles.content:
India has formally began helping Africa in its fight against malaria, the vector-borne disease that has infected many and claimed several lives, including those of children.
